name: MySQL5
queryCode:
SELECT
t1.`ACCOUNT`,
t1.`CREATEDATE`,
t1.`CREATEMAN`,
DATE_FORMAT(t1.DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') as `DATE`,
t1.`IBZ_REPORTLYID`,
t1.`IBZ_REPORTLYNAME`,
t1.`ISSUBMIT`,
CONCAT_WS('','工作内容：',case when t1.CONTENT is null then '无' else t1.CONTENT end)  as `CONTENT`,
t1.`MAILTO`,
'1' as `REPORTSTATUS`,
t1.`REPORTTO`,
t1.`SUBMITTIME`,
t1.`UPDATEDATE`,
t1.`UPDATEMAN`, 
'reportly' as type 
FROM `T_IBZ_REPORTLY` t1
